A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Absolute trash movie. Total waste of time. Plot was stretched\, way to fast paced some places\, and way to slow in others. Plot didnt make sense\, too many jokes that they dont pull off correctly\, some transitions were absolute trash. May I point out that Luke learned the way of the Jedi throughout 3 whole movies\, being trained by Yoda. Now Rey comes in and seems to know everything to know about how to control rocks\, maneuver a lightsaber\, and all of the stuff that Luke learned throughout 3 movies\, but she learned them in one. By the way\, the actor for Kylo Ren is not great at all. And how the heck did Leia somehow get blown apart in their ship\, and just stay alive in space? Thats not how it works! She doesnt even know how to use the force! And did I mention that this movie is a waste of time? Dont see it\, worst Star Wars movie ever.
